metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare AI solutions power and protect AI applications with our global GPU network. Learn how Cloudflare can assist with shaping your AI strategy.

relatedBlades.title: Accelerate your AI journey
relatedBlades.copy: You've got your AI vision. Cloudflare's unified security, connectivity, and developer platform helps you execute on that vision with greater speed and security.

relatedBlades.title: Complexity diminishes AI impact
relatedBlades.copy: Organizations have ambitious AI goals. But many projects are held back by slow development, scaling issues, and new kinds of risk.

columnContent.title: Slow AI development
columnContent.description: Complex toolchains and a constantly shifting tech landscape hinder AI innovation.

columnContent.title: Challenging AI scaling
columnContent.description: Global user bases, usage spikes, and inflexible compute costs hold back AI growth.

columnContent.title: Growing AI risk
columnContent.description: Limited visibility, complex risk management, and poor data governance limit AI's impact, including with AI-generated code.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare is your single point of AI control
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's [connectivity cloud](https://www.cloudflare.com/connectivity-cloud/) lets organizations build AI applications, connect and scale AI apps, and protect their entire AI lifecycle from a single global platform.

columnContent.title: Faster innovation
columnContent.description: Build AI applications with greater speed, lower costs, and increased agility — no matter the AI model.

columnContent.title: Global scale
columnContent.description: Deliver reliable, fast experiences across complex AI stacks and global user bases.

columnContent.title: Built-in security
columnContent.description: Understand and manage AI risk without getting lost in dashboards or constant policy updates.

relatedBlades.title: Ebook: The enterprise guide to securing and scaling AI
relatedBlades.copy: Learn why enterprises struggle to meaningfully build and secure AI infrastructure at scale, why hyperscalers' AI infrastructure often falls short, and how to overcome those struggles.

relatedBlades.title: Global leaders, including 30% of the Fortune 1000, rely on Cloudflare
Ready to have a conversation with a specialist?

relatedBlades.title: A unified platform of AI security, connectivity, and developer services
relatedBlades.description: Cloudflare's AI services are built to run anywhere in our %{DataCenterCount}+ city global network — and are already used by 80% of the top 50 generative AI companies.

columnContent.title: Build
columnContent.description: Build full-stack AI applications with access to 50+ AI models across our global network. Build and run agents without paying for wait time.

columnContent.title: Connect
columnContent.description: Control and observe AI-powered apps, while reducing inference costs and dynamically routing traffic. Build MCP servers that run across our global network

columnContent.title: Protect
columnContent.description: Extend visibility, mitigate risk, and protect data across the AI lifecycle. Control how AI crawlers can access your web content.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Cloudflare helps Indeed discover and manage shadow AI use

content.value: Indeed, a leading job site, wanted better insight into and control over the AI applications their workforce used.

They turned to Cloudflare's AI security suite, which helps discover AI usage patterns and enforce data use policies. Now, Indeed is on the road to achieving the right balance of innovation and control.
"Cloudflare helps us find what shadow AI risks exist and block unsanctioned AI apps and chatbots."

features.title: ChainFuse
features.description: Workers AI and Vectorize enable ChainFuse to organize, categorize, and unify unstructured user feedback

features.title: OpenSay
features.description: The HuggingFace and Workers AI integration helps OpenSay test language models like Llama Guard to identify user-based behaviors

features.title: Applied Systems
features.description: Applied Systems unifies security and networking with Cloudflare, reducing risk, improving productivity for employees, and delivering superior cloud-native experiences for customers

features.title: Audioflare
features.description: AI Gateway manages the performance and reliability of Audioflare with analytics, logging, caching, and rate limiting

features.title: Suki-Desu
features.description: Workers AI gives Suki-Desu a cost-effective way to translate text across multiple WordPress sites

features.title: Cyndx
features.description: AI Gateway reduced Cyndx's AI inference costs by 95%, and Workers AI provides fast AI models for summarizing important information.

features.title: Cloudflare AI Security Suite
features.description: Adopt AI with confidence. Learn how Cloudflare AI Security Suite protects the entire AI lifecycle against attacks like prompt injection, data exfiltration, and model abuse.

features.title: Building AI on Cloudflare
features.description: Learn more about how Cloudflare can help you build AI apps and agents.

features.title: The CxO's guide to AI security
features.description: Learn more about common AI security challenges and how to overcome them.

relatedBlades.title: Learn about other ways our connectivity cloud can meet your business needs

features.title: Modernize web applications
features.description: Cloudflare accelerates the time-to-value for your application modernization strategy — whether you are rehosting, replatforming, refactoring, or building new apps.

features.title: Modernize security
features.description: Cloudflare simplifies and strengthens your enterprise security by unifying network, application, cloud, and AI protection into a single security platform.
